Climate Action.reason: Core theme; Net-Zero, carbon accounting, and policy signals.

gemini_critique.critique: No revisions needed. Model B's analysis aligns with mine on core themes, but my original analysis provided more comprehensive evidence and stronger justifications for several SDGs.
